comment: A man in brown t-shirt is playing a violin while another man who looks like him is accompanying him on a banjo .
A male vocalist and his accompanying guitarist wearing white pants are performing on stage .
The woman sings into the microphone while the two men accompany her on a keyboard and guitar .
A woman singing and playing an acoustic guitar and three people accompanying her .
A man singing on stage with a female musician accompanying .
Two female singers on stage with a guitarist , keyboardist and drummer accompanying .
Several farmers bent over working on the fields while lady with a baby and four other children accompany them .
An African American woman sings while drums accompany her .
Two women dressed in bright pink dress accompany a young boy in a pink shirt to a clothing store .
A long-haired man belts out a tune on a trumpet while accompanying his band .
